translated: They receive the sublime Dharma flavor and pure nectar of the Tathagata.
The food and drink are sufficient to nourish the body field.

original: 福德智慧發菩□□永離邪行歸依三寶。
analyzed: 福德智慧發菩□□永離邪行歸依三寶。
translated: Merit and wisdom give rise to the mind of enlightenment, forever leaving wrong practices and taking refuge in the Three Jewels.
Practicing the mind of great compassion, benefiting sentient beings.

original: 求無上道不受輪迴諸惡苦果。
analyzed: 求無上道不受輪迴諸惡苦果。
translated: Seeking the unsurpassed path, not accepting the evil fruits of suffering in the cycle of rebirth.
Always born in a good family, leaving all fears.
The body is always pure, realizing the unsurpassed path.
Having thus completed the three announcements,
One then uses incense, flowers, lamps, and ointments to transport the mind.

original: 供養諸佛般若菩薩金剛天等。
analyzed: 供養諸佛般若菩薩金剛天等。
translated: Making offerings to all Buddhas, Prajñā Bodhisattvas, Vajra Devas, and so forth.
Immeasurable sages and all the paths of karma.
May they only take pity and descend to accept.
Having made slight offerings and prostrated three times,
Receiving the holy assembly and entering within the altar.

original: 右遶三帀還復面東作禮聖眾。
analyzed: 右遶三帀還復面東作禮聖眾。
translated: Circumambulating three times to the right, returning to face east and make offerings to the holy assembly.

original: 即以香華燈塗種種法事供養次即發露己身所有罪咎懺悔已竟。
analyzed: 即以香華燈塗種種法事供養次即發露己身所有罪咎懺悔已竟。
translated: Then using incense, flowers, lamps, ointments, and various Dharma practices to make offerings, next confessing one's own faults and repenting.
Again making offerings to the holy assembly.

original: 即以塗香戒度塗掌運心入觀方可作法。
analyzed: 即以塗香戒度塗掌運心入觀方可作法。
translated: Then use the incense of precepts to anoint the palms, and with the mind enter into contemplation before performing the ritual.
Next, form the mudrā for destroying the hells.
The two wings form the vajra fist.
The generosity and wisdom fingers are hooked together.
The effort and strength fingers are erected and joined side by side.
Mentally imagine opening the hells.
Recite three times and pull apart three times.
The mantra states:

original: 娜謨阿瑟吒二合試帝南三弭也二合三沒馱俱胝南唵引惹𭔞二合曩嚩婆細地哩地哩吽由此印呪威力故。
analyzed: 娜謨阿瑟吒二合試帝南三弭也二合三沒馱俱胝南唵引惹𭔞二合曩嚩婆細地哩地哩吽由此印呪威力故。
translated: Namo ashtasahasra-satye namaḥ samanta-buddhānāṃ oṃ jāta-vajra-pāśa-dhiri dhiri hūṃ By the power of this mudrā and mantra,
All the gates to the hells in the various destinies,
Will spontaneously open upon seeing this mudrā and mantra.
Next, form the mudrā for summoning hungry ghosts.
The left wing forms the fearless gesture.
The right wing is erected in front,
With the effort finger slightly bent to hook and summon.
The mantra states:

original: 唵引𡁠曩𡁠迦曀呬曳二合呬娑嚩二合賀既召請已。
analyzed: 唵引𡁠曩𡁠迦曀呬曳二合呬娑嚩二合賀既召請已。
translated: Oṃ hūṃ nātha hīhi hīhi svāhā Having summoned,
They all gather like clouds.
With a compassionate mind, praise and console them.
After delighting them, they will thirst for the Dharma.
Next, form the summoning of sins mudrā.

original: 二羽金剛縛。🔽忍願伸如針。
analyzed: 二羽金剛縛。 忍願伸如針。
translated: The two wings are bound like vajra.🔽The forbearance and vows are extended like needles.
The effort and strength are bent like hooks.
The mantra for summoning sins says:

now that you and I have formed the mudrā and recited the mantra,
the throat will open by itself,
penetrating without obstruction, free from all hindrances.
O disciples of the buddhas,

analyzed: 我今為汝稱讚如來吉祥名號。
translated: I will now praise for you the auspicious names of the tathāgatas,

analyzed: 能令汝等永離三塗八難之苦。
translated: which can enable you to forever part from the sufferings of the three evil paths and eight difficulties,
and always be the true and pure disciples of the tathāgatas.

original: 南無寶勝如來若有大眾一時為稱。
analyzed: 南無寶勝如來若有大眾一時為稱。
translated: Namo Ratnatārāyai Tathāgatāya If there is a large assembly, they should chant together at one time.
O disciples of the buddhas,
if you hear the name of the Tathāgata Ratnatārā,

original: 能令汝等塵勞業火悉皆消滅。
analyzed: 能令汝等塵勞業火悉皆消滅。
translated: it can enable you to extinguish all the fires of afflictions and karma.

original: 南無離怖畏如來准前為稱下皆例此。
analyzed: 南無離怖畏如來准前為稱下皆例此。
translated: Namo to the Tathagata who is free from fear, as before, chant the following in the same way.
All Buddha's disciples,
if you hear the name of the Tathagata who is free from fear,
it can enable you to always attain peace and happiness,
forever free from fear, pure and joyful.
Namo to the Tathagata with the vast body.
All Buddha's disciples,
if you hear the name of the Tathagata with the vast body,

original: 能令汝等餓鬼針咽業火停燒清涼通達。
analyzed: 能令汝等餓鬼針咽業火停燒清涼通達。
translated: it can enable you hungry ghosts with throats as thin as needles and karmic fires burning to have cool relief and pass through.
The food and drink you receive will have the taste of nectar.
Namo to the Tathagata with the wonderful form body.
All Buddha's disciples,
if you hear the name of the Tathagata with the wonderful form body,
it can enable you not to receive ugly appearances.

original: 諸根具足相好圓滿殊勝端嚴。
analyzed: 諸根具足相好圓滿殊勝端嚴。
translated: Your faculties will be complete, your marks and characteristics will be perfect, and you will be exceptionally dignified.
In the heavens and the human realm, you will be the foremost.
Namo to the Tathagata of Abundant Treasures.
All Buddha's disciples,
if you hear the name of the Tathagata of Abundant Treasures,
Causing you all to be replete with wealth and treasures.
According to your wishes, enjoy inexhaustible use.
Homage to Amitābha Tathāgata.
All you children of the buddhas,
If you hear the name of Amitābha Tathāgata,

original: 能令汝等往生西方極樂世界。
analyzed: 能令汝等往生西方極樂世界。
translated: It can cause you all to be reborn in the Western Land of Ultimate Bliss.
Born from a lotus flower, you will enter the stage of nonretrogression.

original: 南無世間廣大威德自在光明如來。
analyzed: 南無世間廣大威德自在光明如來。
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata of Vast and Powerful Light in the World.
All you children of the buddhas,

original: 若聞世間廣大威德自在光明如來名號。
analyzed: 若聞世間廣大威德自在光明如來名號。
translated: If you hear the name of the Tathāgata of Vast and Powerful Light in the World,

original: 能令汝等獲得五種功德。
analyzed: 能令汝等獲得五種功德。
translated: It can cause you to obtain five kinds of merits.

original: 一者於諸世間最為第一。
analyzed: 一者於諸世間最為第一。
translated: First, you will be foremost in all worlds.

original: 二者得菩薩目端嚴殊勝。
analyzed: 二者得菩薩目端嚴殊勝。
translated: Second, you will obtain the eyes of a bodhisattva, which are upright and excellent.

original: 三者威德廣大超過一切外道天魔。
analyzed: 三者威德廣大超過一切外道天魔。
translated: Third, your vast and powerful light will surpass all non-Buddhist paths and celestial demons.
Like the sun illuminating the world,
Shining in the great ocean,
Your merits are lofty and majestic.

original: 四者得大自在所向如意。
analyzed: 四者得大自在所向如意。
translated: Fourth, you will obtain great freedom and go wherever you wish.
Like a bird flying through the sky without obstruction.

original: 五者得大堅固智慧光明。
analyzed: 五者得大堅固智慧光明。
translated: Fifth, one attains great firm wisdom and light.
The body and mind are clear and penetrating like a lapis lazuli jewel.
All Buddha's disciples!
These seven Tathagatas, by the power of their vows,
Deliver sentient beings, forever free from afflictions.
Free from the sufferings of the three evil paths, always peaceful and joyful.

original: 一稱其名千生離苦證無上道。
analyzed: 一稱其名千生離苦證無上道。
translated: Merely by chanting their names once, one will be free from suffering for a thousand lifetimes and realize the unsurpassed path.
Next, together with you all, I will take refuge in the Three Jewels.

original: 歸依佛兩足尊歸依法離欲尊歸依僧眾中尊三說。
analyzed: 歸依佛兩足尊歸依法離欲尊歸依僧眾中尊三說。
translated: I take refuge in the Buddha, the Honored One of the Two-Footed I take refuge in the Dharma, the Honored One who is free from desires I take refuge in the Sangha, the Honored One among the assembly (Repeat three times)

original: 汝等佛子歸依佛竟歸依法竟歸依僧竟三說。
analyzed: 汝等佛子歸依佛竟歸依法竟歸依僧竟三說。
translated: You Buddha's disciples, you have taken refuge in the Buddha, you have taken refuge in the Dharma, you have taken refuge in the Sangha (Repeat three times)

original: 汝依三寶故如法堅護持。
analyzed: 汝依三寶故如法堅護持。
translated: Because you have taken refuge in the Three Jewels, you should firmly uphold the precepts according to the Dharma.
Next, I will help you all generate the Bodhi mind.
You all listen attentively.
Make the vajra-palms, with the forbearance and aspiration fingers like lotus leaves.
Use this mudra above the heart.
The mantra says:

original: 唵引󰂛地唧多一母怛跛二合二娜野弭三今為汝等發菩提心竟。
analyzed: 唵引󰂛地唧多一母怛跛二合二娜野弭三今為汝等發菩提心竟。
translated: Oṃ bodhicitta mūrdha-pūrṇa-nayami Now for you all, the bodhicitta has been generated.
All Buddha's disciples should know.
The bodhicitta arises from great compassion.
It is the correct cause for becoming a Buddha, the fundamental wisdom.

original: 能破無明煩惱惡業不被染壞。
analyzed: 能破無明煩惱惡業不被染壞。
translated: It can destroy ignorance, afflictions, and evil karma, and is not tainted or destroyed.

original: 次為汝等受三昧耶戒印。
analyzed: 次為汝等受三昧耶戒印。
translated: Next, for you all, I will bestow the samaya precepts mudrā.
With the two wings, extend the forbearance and vow fingers like needles.
The mantra says:

original: 唵引三昧耶薩怛鑁二合今為汝等受三昧耶戒竟。
analyzed: 唵引三昧耶薩怛鑁二合今為汝等受三昧耶戒竟。
translated: Oṃ samaya satvaṃ Now for you all, the samaya precepts have been bestowed.
From now on,
it will enable you all
to enter the stage of the Tathāgata.
You are true Buddha's disciples,
born from the Dharma, and have obtained the Buddha's Dharma portion.

original: 次結無量威德自在光明如來印左羽想持器。
analyzed: 次結無量威德自在光明如來印左羽想持器。
translated: Next, form the mudrā of the Tathāgata of Immeasurable Majestic Virtue and Freedom, visualize holding a vessel with the left hand,
and snap the forbearance and meditation fingers with the right hand.

original: 想於左羽掌中有一鑁字。
analyzed: 想於左羽掌中有一鑁字。
translated: Visualize a vaṃ syllable in the palm of the left hand.

original: 流出種種無量甘露法食。
analyzed: 流出種種無量甘露法食。
translated: Flowing out various immeasurable nectar-like Dharma food.

By the power of this mudrā and mantra empowerment,

analyzed: 流注法界普濟汝等一切有情。
translated: Flowing throughout the Dharma realm, universally benefiting you and all sentient beings.
Fully satisfying and nourishing.

translated: Face east and pour it in front of the altar, on a clean ground, on a large rock, or in a purified earthen basin, also called an alms bowl or liberation platform, which is also acceptable, or in a spring, pond, river, ocean, or long flowing water.

translated: at the break of dawn, when the sun rises, this is the time for making offerings.

original: 若鬼神法當於人定子時亦得人定最上本阿闍梨法。

if it is the time of the fast, throughout the day.

Flying birds, beasts, and water creatures,
do not discriminate the time, just use them to give.

original: 若作餓鬼施食之法當於亥時是施食時。
analyzed: 若作餓鬼施食之法當於亥時是施食時。
translated: If you perform the Dharma of giving food to hungry ghosts, at the time of the pig, this is the time to give food.
If one offers food to hungry ghosts during the observance period,
It is in vain to expend one's labor, for it will ultimately be ineffective.
It is not the proper time, and one falsely generates empty deception.
The ghosts and spirits cannot obtain food.
If one does not receive it from a teacher, one invites misfortune upon oneself.
It becomes the crime of stealing the Dharma.
All you disciples,
Although things are grouped according to their kind,
Do not be angry or resentful.
However, everything I offer is unobstructed.

original: 無高無下平等普遍不擇冤親。
analyzed: 無高無下平等普遍不擇冤親。
translated: Without high or low, it is universally equal, without discriminating between enemies and friends.
Today, do not use your status to slight others,
Relying on your strength to oppress the weak, blocking the solitary and young.
Do not allow them to obtain food.
Do not make it uneven and unbalanced.
Transgressing the Buddha's compassionate relief.
You must love and care for each other.
Just like parents thinking of their only child.
Speak to all you disciples.

original: 汝等各有父母兄弟姊妹妻子眷屬善友親戚。
analyzed: 汝等各有父母兄弟姊妹妻子眷屬善友親戚。

You Buddha's disciples, with compassionate love,

analyzed: 各各賫持飲食錢財物等。
translated: Each of you bring food, drink, money, and other goods,
Passing them on to each other, giving generously to fill and satisfy,
Without any lack, causing them to give rise to the intention for the Way.
Forever leaving the three evil paths, permanently transcending the four streams,
You should abandon this body and quickly transcend to the fruit of the Way.

original: 又為汝等將此淨食分為三分。
analyzed: 又為汝等將此淨食分為三分。
translated: Moreover, for you, take this pure food and divide it into three parts.
One is offered to the water creatures, causing them to attain the emptiness of persons.
Two are offered to the furry herd, causing them to attain the silence of the Dharma.
Three are offered to those in other places who receive consciousness and mold form.
All are caused to be completely satisfied and attain the acceptance of non-birth.

translated: Next, form the universal offering mudra, make the vajra-clasped palms, place the mudra in front of the heart, and recite the mantra.
Oṃ ākhaṃ svāhā. O children of the buddhas, the food and drink you have received from the beginning are all from human beings who trade in life.

original: 酒脯錢財血肉腥膻葷辛臭穢。
analyzed: 酒脯錢財血肉腥膻葷辛臭穢。
translated: Wine, dried meat, money, blood, flesh, fishy smells, pungent and spicy foul odors.
Although you have received such food and drink,
It is like poison that harms the body.
It only increases the basis of suffering.
Sinking and drowning in the ocean of suffering,
There is no time for liberation.

original: 我某甲依如來教精誠罄捨。
analyzed: 我某甲依如來教精誠罄捨。
translated: I, [name], rely on the teachings of the Tathāgata, with sincere heart and complete abandonment.
I set up this unobstructed vast Dharma assembly.

analyzed: 汝等今日遇茲勝善戒品霑身。
translated: You all today encounter this excellent goodness, and the precepts permeate the body.
In past lives, you extensively served the buddhas,
Began close friendships, and made offerings to the Three Jewels.

original: 由此因緣值善知識發菩提心。
analyzed: 由此因緣值善知識發菩提心。
translated: By these causes and conditions, you encountered good spiritual friends and gave rise to the bodhi mind.
You vowed to become a buddha and did not seek other fruits.
Those who attained the Way first took turns to deliver and liberate others.
Moreover, I wish that you day and night always
Protect me and fulfill my wishes.
With the merit generated by this offering of food,
I will universally dedicate it to sentient beings in the Dharma realm.
Together with all sentient beings, I will share this merit.

original: 盡皆迴施無上菩提一切智智。
analyzed: 盡皆迴施無上菩提一切智智。
translated: I will dedicate it all to unsurpassed bodhi and omniscience.
Do not attract other fruits, but vow to quickly attain Buddhahood.

Wait until the person is settled and empowered.

translated: Giving to the innumerable hungry ghosts and other spirits at all times, if there is only clean food that has not been used before, keep it to give as an offering, and one will be able to fully accumulate immeasurable merit and virtue.

original: 則同供養百千俱胝如來功德等無差別。
analyzed: 則同供養百千俱胝如來功德等無差別。

All non-humans, yakshas, rakshasas,
and evil ghosts and spirits dare not encroach and harm.
Moreover, one can accomplish immeasurable majestic virtue.

with pure food and drink filling a vessel,

Correct understanding is pure and endowed with wholesome roots.

To universally hear and see this, and always cultivate this Dharma.
